Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Barcelo Aran Mantegna in Rome (EUR), you'll be close to Catacombs of St. Domitilla and Colosseum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Fosse Ardeatine and Basilica of St. Paul Outside the Walls.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 323 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Barcelo Aran Mantegna in Rome (EUR), you'll be close to Catacombs of St. Domitilla and Colosseum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Fosse Ardeatine and Basilica of St. Paul Outside the Walls.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Catacombs of St. Domitilla - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Fosse Ardeatine - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Basilica of St. Paul Outside the Walls - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Catacombs of St. Callixtus - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Parco Archeologico Appia Antica - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Roma Tre University - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Catacombs of St. Sebastian - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
I Granai Shopping Center - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Tomb of Cecilia Metella - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Montemartini Museum - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Abbazia delle Tre Fontane - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Museo delle Mura - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Parco della Caffarella - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Palazzo dei Congressi - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Museum of Roman Civilization - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 9.9 km / 6.2 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi

The preferred airport for Barcelo Aran Mantegna is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Aran Mantegna Hotel are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 9.9 km / 6.2 mi
Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi

The preferred airport for Aran Mantegna Hotel is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).

Message.Text:
Room 1
Check in time: 2 pmCheck out time: 12 amCancellation free of charge if made 1 day before the date of arrival. After this dead line will be applied a 1 night stay penalty. No-Show: all the stay amount as penalty.
Notice
Local Charges: €6.00 city tax per person per night


The room rate does not include the local tourist tax, to be paid directly to the hotel.
